title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.77 - Critical care units (type ii)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.77 - Critical care units (type ii)

State Regulations
(a) Intensive nursing care. (b) Intensive nursing care 24 hours a day. (c) Medical director who has completed
residency training in one of the major clinical specialties and has acquired
advanced skills and knowledge in life support and patient monitoring
techniques. (d) MD rounds within
the unit at least every 24 hours, and available in-house or on call 24 hours a
day. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.77

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
